solution_line_template: Miles's collection has {miles_pages} pages because {miles_inches} x {miles_pages_per_inch} = <<{miles_inches}*{miles_pages_per_inch}={miles_pages}>>{miles_pages}
Daphne's collection has {daphne_pages} pages because {daphne_inches} x {daphne_pages_per_inch} = <<{daphne_inches}*{daphne_pages_per_inch}={daphne_pages}>>{daphne_pages}
The largest collection has {daphne_pages} pages because {daphne_pages} > {miles_pages}
